model

Class BaseJDBC<Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BaseJDBC<Entity>
  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - The Entity class which will have JDBC actions
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonJDBC<Entity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmployeeJDBC, SalesJDBC, TableJDBC

    public abstract class BaseJDBC<Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommonJDBC<Entity>
    A generic abstract class which serves as the base of all the Entity classes with corresponding database tables and JDBC actions. Implements the CommonJDBC interface.
    Author:
    Phillip Witkin

      • update

        public abstract Entity update(Entity updatedEntity)
        Description copied from interface: CommonJDBC
        Updates a given object's database information with new information. Cannot update an ID.
        Specified by:
        update in interface CommonJDBC<Entity>
        Parameters:
        updatedEntity - The updated object data; Can have unchanged fields blank, but must contain an ID to update proper entry.
        Returns:
        The updated object with all of its new data. Returns null if the ID in the updatedEntity parameter has no match.
